en: WSM Grand Ole Opry presents Rod Brasfield, Bill Catrell and the Blue Seal Pals

Poster is for a big radio show at Lexington High School on Thursday, May 24, sponsored by the American Legion. Admission was 30 or 60 cents.  Rod Brasfield was a comedian member of the Grand Ole Opry.    Guessing the date because Brasfield started with the Opry in 1940, was invited to join in 1944, and Thurs May 24 happened in 1945.
Era 8 - The Great Depression and World War II (1929-1945)
